RSBR_15_years

Welcome to SSPARQ’s documentation!

This repository contains reproducible material for the study “Scalable Seismological Pipeline for Assessment, Review, and Quality (SSPARQ) of Seismic Data” by Diogo Luiz de Oliveira Coelho1, André Vinícius de Sousa Nascimento1, Gilberto da Silva Leite Neto1,Marcelo Belentani de Bianchi2, Ítalo Cley Borges de Santana Maurício1, Eveline Alves Sayão1, and Sergio Luiz Fontes1, submitted to Seismological Research Letters.

  1. Geophysics Department, Observatório Nacional, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.

  2. Geophysics Department, Universidade de São Paulo, São Paulo, Brazil.

For further info, check out Usage. Read installation instructions in Installation topic.

Warning

The code is still experimental (under heavy development) so you should regularly check for (and pull) updates.
